testcase.name: TC_22 Add to cart from Recommended items
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'.......................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed When Scroll to bottom of page...............................................passed Then Verify 'RECOMMENDED ITEMS' is visible..................................passed And Click on Add To Cart on Recommended product.............................passed And Click Continue Shopping button..........................................passed And Click on View Cart button...............................................passed Then Verify that product is displayed in cart page..........................passed And Close driver............................................................passed
